item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, March 27, 2025 at 2:55 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Blender releases their Oscar winning version tool (201 points | 44 comments)
2. OpenAI adds MCP support to Agents SDK (459 points | 149 comments)
3. Debian bookworm live images now reproducible (461 points | 98 comments)
4. Europen Union creates Fedora-based Linux distribution for the public sector (24 points | 4 comments)
5. DJ With Apple Music launches to enable subscribers to mix their own sets (37 points | 12 comments)
6. A love letter to the CSV format (354 points | 344 comments)
7. The mysterious flow of fluid in the brain (36 points | 5 comments)
8. Building a Linux Container Runtime from Scratch (75 points | 7 comments)
9. Botswana Successfully Launches First Satellite, Botsat-1 (227 points | 80 comments)
10. Good-bye core types; Hello Go as we know and love it (241 points | 136 comments)
11. Problems with the heap (117 points | 25 comments)
12. War story: the hardest bug I ever debugged (22 points | discuss)
13. Building a Firecracker-Powered Course Platform to Learn Docker and Kubernetes (70 points | 6 comments)
14. MCP server for Ghidra (213 points | 29 comments)
15. Writing a tiny undo/redo stack in JavaScript (73 points | 21 comments)
16. Gemma3 Function Calling (120 points | 14 comments)
17. Oracle customers confirm data stolen in alleged cloud breach is valid (212 points | 44 comments)
18. Writing Programs with Ncurses (66 points | 17 comments)
19. NotaGen: Symbolic Music Generation (42 points | 10 comments)
20. Cilium eBPF-Go on Windows (5 points | discuss)
21. 'Naive' science fan faces jail for plutonium import (147 points | 95 comments)
22. Malware found on NPM infecting local package with reverse shell (178 points | 105 comments)
23. Weave (YC W25) is hiring a founding product engineer ( | hide)
24. Collapse OS (152 points | 136 comments)
25. Has the decline of knowledge work begun? (142 points | 216 comments)
26. Heap-overflowing Llama.cpp to RCE (235 points | 50 comments)
27. Sharding Pgvector (67 points | 10 comments)
28. The long-awaited Friend Compound laws in California (86 points | 132 comments)
29. How to Delete Your 23andMe Data (165 points | 88 comments)
30. A glitch in an online survey replaced the word 'yes' with 'forks' (154 points | 68 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, March 27, 2025 at 2:55 AM UTC
